ygData.subject: RE: Magical Gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: What time of day do you play? (And what time zone are you in?) I find that the game is vastly different at different time of the r/l day.  The peak hours for
ygData.messageBody:
What time of day do you play? (And what time zone are you in?) I find that
the game is vastly different at different time of the r/l day. The peak
hours for number of players seems to be US evening hours. Not necessarily
the quality time. Try all different hours of the day. Other option is a
combine dagger or a crookstinger. A dirk is good - my first choice but not
for 75pp - you can get 2 combine daggers for that and have change for milk
and muffins!

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)
[mailto:kblair@...]
Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 1:06 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical Gloves?

From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>

> Dragoon Dirk - get one a.s.a.p. 20pp or so in or near
Crushbone.

I've been searching (on Veeshan) for one of these for 3
weeks now in various
zones and continents. The *only* time someone was selling
one and replied to
me was for 75pp. I'm sorry, but magical or not - I'm not
paying 75pp for a
friggin' dagger - at least not that particular dagger.
